forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address below and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
errorNetwork: Network Error. Please check your connection and try again.
errorDefault: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errorValidEmail: Email must be a valid email address.
errorEmptyEmailPassword: Email and password cannot be empty.
errorTooManyRequest: Too many requests, please try again later.
errorPasswordTooWeak: Password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
errorUsernameTooLong: Username must be at least 3 characters long and no more than 30 characters.
resetPasswordDescription: Enter a new password for your account.
passwordChangedSuccessfully: Your password has been changed successfully!
verificationFailedDescription: We couldn't verify your email. The link may be invalid or expired.
emailAlreadyVerified: Email is already verified. You can now continue.
removeFromFriends1: Are you sure you want to remove
requiredPermissionsCameraMessage: The app requires access to the camera for proper functionality. Please check the permissions in your device settings.
requiredPermissionsStorageMessage: The app requires access to storage to save and load files. Please check the permissions in your device settings.
showBankAccountNumberTip: The bank account number is used to generate QR payments. For Czech or Slovak bank accounts, you can enter the account in the standard format: prefix–account number/bank code. Users from other countries should enter their account in IBAN format. The required account format depends on the country selected when entering your details.
showBankAccountNumberDescription: Enter your password to verify your identity and view the protected bank account number.
showIbanDescription: Enter your password to verify your identity and view the protected IBAN.
invalidBankAccountFormat: Invalid bank account number format, e.g. 19-1234567890/0800
unsavedChangesMessage: Are you sure you want to discard unsaved changes?
errorBankNumberNeedCountry: If you enter a bank account number or IBAN, you must also select the bank account country.
errorBirthDateInFuture: Date of birth cannot be in the future.
valueNumberInvalid: The entered value is outside the allowed range.
descriptionTooLong: Description can be up to 250 characters long.
errorCategoryChangeNotAllowed: This food item (including its variant) already exists in the inventory. The category cannot be changed when adding the food.
variantExplanationTip: The variant is used to distinguish food items with the same barcode (e.g. different flavors or types).

bankNumber.STRING_EMPTY: If you enter a bank account number or IBAN, you must also select the bank account country.
bankNumber.SPAYD_GENERATION_FAILED: Invalid bank account number or IBAN.
bankNumber.SPAYD_INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid bank account number or IBAN.
bankNumber.INVALID_CONVERT_IBAN: Invalid bank account number format, e.g. 19-1234567890/0800
bankNumber.default: Invalid bank account number or IBAN.

name.STRING_MAX: The first name can be up to 40 characters long.
name.default: Error in the first name field.

surname.STRING_MAX: The last name can be up to 40 characters long.
surname.default: Error in the last name field.

birthDate.DATE_MAX: Date of birth cannot be in the future.
birthDate.default: Error in the date of birth.

gender.default: Gender must be selected from the available options.

country.default: Country must be selected from the available options.

email.STRING_EMAIL: Email must be a valid email address.
email.STRING_EMPTY: Email and password cannot be empty.
email.EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: A user with this email already exists.

password.STRING_EMPTY: Email and password cannot be empty.
password.STRING_PATTERN.BASE: Password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
password.STRING_MIN: Password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.

newPassword.STRING_PATTERN.BASE: Password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.
newPassword.STRING_MIN: Password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a number, and a special character.

username.USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: A user with this username already exists.
username.STRING_MAX: Username must be between 3 and 30 characters.
username.STRING_MIN: Username must be between 3 and 30 characters.

token.INVALID_TOKEN: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
token.TOKEN_EXPIRED: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

amount.QUANTITY_UNIT_REQUIRED: When entering a quantity, a unit must also be selected.
amount.default: Množství musí být platné číslo (max. 2 desetinná místa).

price.default: Cena musí být platné číslo (max. 2 desetinná místa).
